casebody.data:
The State ex rel. McNeal, Appellant, v. City of Dayton et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. McNeal v. Dayton, 119 Ohio St.3d 369, 2008-Ohio-4757.]

(No. 2007-1954 Submitted August 26, 2008 Decided September 24, 2008.) Michael J. Muldoon, for appellant. Nancy Hardin Rogers, Attorney General, and Elise Porter, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
